KIMCHI JJIGAE

Kimchi jjigae is a popular Korean dish made with kimchi, pork, and tofu. It is typically served with rice and is often made with spicy kimchi.

4-6 servings 20 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Pot
  • Spoon

Ingredients

  • Kimchi
  • Pork
  • Tofu
  • Rice
  • Spicy kimchi (optional)

Directions

  1. In a pot, combine kimchi, pork, tofu, and rice.
  2. Add enough water to cover the ingredients. 3.Bring the mixture to a boil.
  3. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
  4. Serve with spicy kimchi (optional).
